attributes.action: propose legislation to the EU mandating that all products containing added water indicate clearly on the packaging whether or not the added water has been fluoridated.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that consumers of products should be given the opportunity to choose whether or not they ingest fluoride through products which have added water, aqua or are otherwise rehydrated.  Labelling should apply to food products, cosmetics, medicines, paints and any other product that may be disposed of or find its way into the water table.
